Blacknightmare::

"Bring some to him and me... we will need it and wer have to say 
cheers... for the new Unicron servant"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "I totally altered his behavior.  He is as evil and twisted as we 
are, sister.  He will be compelled to stay, he is a Minion also." 
Hellplague said, closing Malice's chest panel and getting off the 
bed.
> "I'm going to get some energon.  Stay with him in case he wakes up 
before I return."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> BlackNightmare:
> 
> "Exist a way to prevent that he ran away in case that brainwashing 
> fails"said the4 femme
>

> > Hellplague:
> >  
> > "There is always a chance that it will fail.  I am the best and 
I 
> did everything I could.  But what brainwashing deals with is a 
bunch 
> of unknowns."
> > The grin faded a little, then Hellplague opened Malice's chest 
> panel.  She put her finger on a small Autobot insignia then looked 
> up at Blacknightmare.
> > "See this?  It's a raised stamp that is on all Autobot spark 
> chamber panels.  But watch this."
> > The Sweep commander picked at the raised portion until it came 
> off, revealing a depression with a Decepticon symbol etched in it.
> > "He wasn't lying when he said he was the brother of Megatron.  
His 
> serial number, internal chronometer, it all matches.  He is the 
> younger brothr of Megatron, so there's no telling what he is 
> capable.  But we have him, it is highly unlikely that he will 
escape 
> my brainwashing."

carry

It
